column4: can anyone tell me is 800x600 resolution all that is available 9.10
yes if you dont configure video drivers
LAMP is obviuously a good choice as you are not running an X server which makes it more secure and use less resources
i'd advise LAMP, keep it pure
i'd look at what they mean, i'm going to
the X just means any OS, so its generic, You can make MAMPP by using it on a Mac, It covers all bases
so you can install ubuntu then install LAMP on it and get the desired effect
use an audio app like banshee and it may stop it. Or log a bug
the bug was reported years ago and has been ignored effectively - i dont use banshee for file management
could use a different filemanager then maybe
the whole desktop management is in nautilus if my understanding is correct - i dont want to do a major rewrite of the system
its not. You are just going to install another browser. Its not rewriting anything at all
you can have nautilus manage the desktop stuff and manage files with thunar if you like. You can install rox and konqueror too if the fancy takes you
